Label.en: Mr Gustave Eiffel took his name from the German 'Eifel' mountain range, from which his family originally hailed
Label.fr: La famille de Gustave Eiffel venait d'une région allemande près des montagnes Eifel' lorsqu'ils ont émigrés en France
Label.es: Mr Gustave Eiffel took his name from the German 'Eifel' mountain range, from which his family originally hailed
Label.zh: Mr Gustave Eiffel took his name from the German 'Eifel' mountain range, from which his family originally hailed

Label.en: However, he was not actually the tower's designer, as many believe...
Label.fr: However, he was not actually the tower's designer, as many believe...
Label.es: However, he was not actually the tower's designer, as many believe...
Label.zh: However, he was not actually the tower's designer, as many believe...

Label.en: In reality, he bought the patent from the designers!
